data.eml:eml: A revision of the Australian intertidal water beetle genus Hughleechia Perkins (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae)

This dataset contains the digitized treatments in Plazi based on the original journal article Perkins, Philip D. (2007): A revision of the Australian intertidal water beetle genus Hughleechia Perkins (Coleoptera: Hydraenidae). Zootaxa 1527: 17-29, DOI: 10.5281/zenodo.177584
